sprinting_stamina_reduction.title: Reduce Sprint Stamina Consumption
sprinting_stamina_reduction.description: Reduces the stamina consumed when sprinting.

swimming_stamina_reduction.title: Reduce Swim Stamina Consumption
swimming_stamina_reduction.description: Reduces the stamina consumed when fast swimming.

idle_stamina_regen.title: Increase Idle Stamina Regeneration
idle_stamina_regen.description: Increases the rate at which stamina regenerates when the player idle or walking.

submerged_stamina_regen.title: Increase Submerged Stamina Regeneration
submerged_stamina_regen.description: Increases the rate at which stamina regenerates when the player is in water.

water_breathing_stamina_regen.title: Increase Water Breathing Stamina Regeneration
water_breathing_stamina_regen.description: Increases the rate at which stamina regenerates when the player is underwater, and the Water Breathing effect is applied.

hunger_reduction.title: Reduce Hunger Decay
hunger_reduction.description: Reduces the rate at which the player's hunger decreases.

heat_dampening.title: Reduce Heat Rate
heat_dampening.description: Reduces the rate at which the player's body temperature increases.

cold_dampening.title: Reduce Cold Rate
cold_dampening.description: Reduces the rate at which the player's body temperature decreases.
